section.title: Overview
section.lines: This page provides information on the Global Search functionality of the PDU OSS Deployment Tracking Tool.

section.title: Purpose of this Feature
section.lines: The purpose of this feature is to allow a user to search for and find Artifacts by any key-value within the tool.

section.title: Usage
section.lines: When logged-in, the user must go to the home-page to access the global-search functionality. The home-page can be accessed by clicking the 'Ericsson DTT' icon in the nav-bar. There are 2 types of searches that can then be performed: Simple and Complex. The usage for both search-types are detailed below.

ol.li: Enter a search-value in the search-bars input-field.
Click the search-button to find Artifacts of any type which contain any key-value(s) that partially-match the provided search-value.
Search-results are displayed in a table below the search-field.
Enter a search-value in the search-bars input-field.
Artifact-Type Parameter: Optional - Select an Artifact-Type from the dropdown to only return results that match the provided Artifact-Type,

Match-Value Parameter: Optional - Select a match-value parameter from the dropdown to only return results where the provided search-value either partially/full matches, is either the start/end of an Artifacts key-value. Alternatively, select the 'by labels' option to only return Deployments which contain all label names specified.
Case-Sensitive Parameter: Optional - Toggle the case-sensitive checkbox to only return results where the search-value case-matches an Artifacts key-value.
Click the search-button to find Artifacts which match the provided search-value and filtering-parameters.
Search-results are displayed in a table below the search-field.

section.lines: A table outputs all search-results from the search-operation performed. The table can be sorted by any column in ascending/descending order by clicking on the individual headers. The table contains link to view/edit each of the Artifacts found.
